description: This file is an entry server module for a Remix application, handling server-side rendering and responses based on request type (bot or browser). It manages HTTP headers, response streaming, and rendering logic using React and Remix server utilities.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that handles incoming requests, sets CORS headers, and delegates to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the response with React's renderToPipeableStream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, similar to handleBotRequest but triggered for non-bot user agents.
